description:
Given a 2D grid map of '1's (land) and '0's (water), count the number of islands. An island is surrounded by water and is formed by connecting adjacent lands horizontally or vertically.

Constraints:

Constraints:

m == grid.length

n == grid[i].length

1 <= m, n <= 300

grid[i][j] is '0' or '1'.
title: Count Of Islands
